api-documentation/congratulations.title: Congratulations!
api-documentation/congratulations.description: You have just learned the basics of Docusaurus and made some changes to the initial template.

api-documentation/create-a-blog-post.title: Create a Blog Post
api-documentation/create-a-blog-post.description: Docusaurus creates a page for each blog post, but also a blog index page, a tag system, an RSS feed...

api-documentation/create-a-document.title: Create a Document
api-documentation/create-a-document.description: Documents are groups of pages connected through:

api-documentation/create-a-page.title: Create a Page
api-documentation/create-a-page.description: Add Markdown or React files to src/pages to create a standalone page:

api-documentation/deploy-your-site.title: Deploy your site
api-documentation/deploy-your-site.description: Docusaurus is a static-site-generator (also called Jamstack).

api-documentation/markdown-features.title: Markdown Features
api-documentation/markdown-features.description: Docusaurus supports Markdown and a few additional features.
